name: bermuda
description: Bermuda allows the GPS coordinates of iOS devices to be modified, empowering users to protect their location privacy.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./packages/main && npm run build-dev" "cd ./packages/renderer && npm run start-dev" "wait-on ./dist/dev/main.js && wait-on tcp:3000 && cd ./packages/main && npm run start-dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./packages/main && npm run build" "cd ./packages/renderer && npm run build"

author: Armin Dizdarevic
